text:
Mainsoft.by has available senior-lever iOS and Android developers for short/long term projects. Locations: Los Angeles, CA (Sales, Administrative); Minsk, Belarus (Development).

Ready to start ASAP. Please check out our case studies @ www.mainsoft.by We provide extensive business automation and programming services and solutions for most popular platforms and domains.

Technologies: Mobile (iOS, Android, Windows Phone), Java, JavaScript, PHP. Team: 50+ high-skilled developers (CVs on demand)
